Package com.backend

Class Event

java.lang.Object
com.backend.Student
com.backend.Event
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, Comparable<Event>, Comparator<Event> 
public class Event
extends Student
implements Comparable<Event>, Comparator<Event>, Cloneable
A Class to Store Events of Students

  • Method Details

    • getMonthsWithYear

      public static String[] getMonthsWithYear​(Date startDateIn, Date endDateIn)
      Gets an Array of all the Months in the range between two months, including the start and the end.

      This is used for labeling graphs, particularly the Line Graph in the Individual Student Reports.

      Parameters:
      startDateIn - The Start Date in the Range
      endDateIn - The End Date in the Range
      Returns:
      An Array of Strings containing all Labels of the dates in the range.

    • monthsInRange

      Returns:
      the range

      Returns:
